title: New Music Stars for 2026
summary: This article talks about the BBC Radio 1 Sound of 2026 list, which predicts new music stars for next year. It introduces 10 up-and-coming artists from around the world, including singers, bands, and rappers. Some artists, like Sombr and Chloe Qisha, are already becoming popular with hit songs. The list is made by music experts and famous musicians like Elton John and Dua Lipa. It helps people discover new music before it becomes super famous. Past winners include big stars like Adele and Stormzy, showing that the list often picks future hits. The winner for 2026 will be announced in January, so fans can look forward to hearing more from these talented acts.

keywords.explanation: A list by BBC Radio 1 that predicts new music stars for the year 2026.

background_read: The BBC Radio 1 Sound of list is a yearly prediction of new music talent that has been running since 2003. It features artists from different genres like pop, rock, and rap, chosen by experts to help people discover future stars. Past winners have become very famous, making it an exciting way to learn about music trends.
Article_Structure: WHO: Music experts and artists like Elton John and Dua Lipa pick the nominees.
WHAT: A list of 10 new music acts predicted to be big in 2026.
WHERE: Announced on BBC Radio 1 and BBC News, with artists from the US, Australia, Ireland, and more.
WHY: To introduce people to up-and-coming music stars and predict future hits.

perspectives.description: The list helps fans find new artists before they become mainstream.
